original_text: Then Absalom would say to him, “Look, your claims are valid and proper, but there is no representative of the king to hear you.”
korean_text: 압살롬이 그에게 이르기를 보라 네 일이 옳고 바르다마는 네 송사를 들을 사람을 왕께서 세우지 아니하셨다 하고

sentences.original_text: Then Absalom would say to him
Look, your claims are valid and proper
but there is no representative of the king
